channel.title: Biography on Eugenio Pescimoro
channel.description: Recent content in Biography on Eugenio Pescimoro

item.title: Eng. Eugenio Pescimoro
item.description: Hydraulic engineer by formation, my entire postgraduate education was focused on water. Profound different working environments shaped and enriched my approach to modelling. Currently pursuing a doctoral course at the Industrial and Applied Mathematics of the University of Nottingham. My main focuses are transport in porous media and geostatistics.
